mapper.sql: id, name, brief, period, test, create_id, create_date, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into course (id, name, brief, period, test, create_id, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{test,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into course
id,
name,
brief,
period,
test,
create_id,
create_date,
modify_date,

mapper.update:
update course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brief = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER},
test = #{test,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brief = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, test = #{test,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from course ORDER BY modify_date DESC
